Harry Styles has dominated the UK charts with the release of Harrys House, the fastest-selling album of 2022 so far.
Harrys House reached No 1 with 113,000 copies sold a number derived from streams,… [+1173 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Lawrence
articles.title: Ellen DeGeneres walks away from her talkshow empire and leaves behind a mixed legacy - The Guardian
articles.description: DeGeneres won over audiences after she came out in 1997. But recent criticism of a hostile work environment undermined her friendly reputation
articles.content:
With tear-stained cheeks, Ellen DeGeneres signed off her chatshow for the final time on Thursday, ending a daytime TV juggernaut that had lasted 19 years.
The guest list for the final show included … [+6827 chars]
